ValidationRule.description: Prevents inbound attribution from using outbound-only channels (ZoomInfo, Apollo, Outreach) for First Touch
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(First_Touch_Lead_Source__c, "Inbound"), OR( ISPICKVAL(First_Touch_Lead_Channel__c, "ZoomInfo"), ISPICKVAL(First_Touch_Lead_Channel__c, "Apollo"), ISPICKVAL(First_Touch_Lead_Channel__c, "Outreach") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Inbound attribution cannot use outbound channels (ZoomInfo/Apollo/Outreach).
